title: Seattle Orcas sign Gulbadin Naib for Major League Cricket Season 3
body:
Seattle Orcas have secured the services of Afghanistan all-rounder Gulbadin Naib for the third season of Major League Cricket (MLC). The dynamic cricketer joins the squad fresh off a triumphant ILT20 campaign, where he played a pivotal role in Dubai Capitals’ title-winning run.

A seasoned T20 campaigner, Naib has amassed 2,284 runs and claimed 89 wickets in his career. He has previously represented Dubai Capitals in ILT20, Delhi Capitals in the Indian Premier League (IPL), and Durdanto Dhaka & Sylhet Strikers in the Bangladesh Premier League (BPL).

Naib also brings international leadership experience, having captained Afghanistan at the ICC ODI Cricket World Cup 2019. In the most recent ILT20 season, he proved his match-winning credentials, contributing 381 runs and 11 wickets, often stepping up as a clutch finisher in crucial chases for the Dubai Capitals.

With his vast experience and all-round prowess, Naib adds strength and firepower to our squad for MLC Season 3.

Welcome to the Podsquad, Gulbadin Naib!
summary: The Seattle Orcas have signed Afghanistan all-rounder Gulbadin Naib for the third season of Major League Cricket (MLC). Naib brings significant experience, having played in various T20 leagues, including the Indian Premier League (IPL) and Bangladesh Premier League (BPL). He also led Afghanistan in the 2019 ICC ODI Cricket World Cup. In his recent campaign with Dubai Capitals in the ILT20, Naib scored 381 runs and took 11 wickets, showcasing his match-winning abilities. His addition strengthens the Seattle Orcas squad for MLC Season 3.

title: San Francisco Unicorns vs. LA Knight Riders & Seattle Orcas vs. Washington Freedom
body:
About

San Francisco Unicorns vs. LA Knight Riders & Seattle Orcas vs. Washington Freedom – Major League Cricket Doubleheader

🕑 Time: 2:00 PM

📍 Location: Oakland Coliseum, 7000 Coliseum Way, Oakland, CA

title: Major League Cricket
body:
Cognizant Major League Cricket 2025 Returns on June 12th

Get ready for another epic season of Cognizant Major League Cricket! The biggest names in the game are back, delivering boundary-smashing excitement and unforgettable moments.

Early Bird Tickets On Sale Now!

This year, we’re going coast-to-coast with games played in Oakland, CA, Grand Prairie, TX, and Broward, FL. This is your chance to witness the fastest, most thrilling format of the game—T20 cricket at its finest. Snap up our early bird offer for a single-header or double-header ticket, good anywhere in the stadium (excluding hospitality seating). A double-header means two high-octane T20 matches in one day—full-on entertainment from afternoon to night, packed with massive sixes, stunning catches, and edge-of-your-seat finishes.

Early Bird Deal:

Single Header: $20 – One T20 showdown

Double Header: $30 – Two T20 matches, all-day cricket fever

Don’t wait—these tickets are your front-row pass to non-stop cricket action. Grab yours today and join Major League Cricket for a 2025 season that’ll leave you cheering!

Hospitality and Private Suites Tickets

title: San Francisco Unicorns vs. Washington Freedom
body:
About

San Francisco Unicorns vs. Washington Freedom – Major League Cricket

📅 Date: Wednesday, June 12, 2025

🕕 Time: 6:00 PM

📍 Location: Oakland Coliseum, 7000 Coliseum Way, Oakland, CA

Major League Cricket (MLC) returns to the Bay Area as the San Francisco Unicorns take on Washington Freedom in an electrifying matchup at the Oakland Coliseum! Witness world-class cricket action as top international and domestic players battle it out under the lights.

🎟 Tickets: Available now—secure your seats for an unforgettable cricket experience!
